content: quote: A Russian naval destroyer seized 29 suspected pirates off the coast of Somalia, Russian news agencies have reported, quoting defence ministry officials. Guns and satellite navigation equipment were found during a search on their boat. BZ +http://www.france24.com/en/20090429-somalia-russia-navy-captures-pirates-gulf-aden-mombasa-trial "None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free." -Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

title: Russia captures 29 Somali pirates

content: Hopefully the Russian judicial system will give these scumbags everything they deserve and then some. At least thats 29 less pirates to worry about, Unlike the British who simply turn them loose so they can attack another ship only hours later. Have a trial at sea, chum the waters and then make them walk the plank
